abstract: Baxter International is in talks to buy Gambro of Sweden for about $4 billion, potentially adding more dialysis products to its lineup, people briefed on the matter said on Friday.
snippet: Baxter International is in talks to buy Gambro of Sweden for about $4 billion, potentially adding more dialysis products to its lineup, people briefed on the matter said on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Baxter International is in talks to buy Gambro of Sweden for about $4 billion, people briefed on the matter said on Friday.

headline.main: Baxter Said to Be in Talks to Acquire Gambro for $4 Billion
headline.print_headline: Baxter Said To Talk With Gambro About a Takeover

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
